item.title: Basic CLI commands for Openshift-Minishift
item.description: Here is a post with the absolute basic commands that I always forget Getting the export Path of oc CLI tool minishift oc-env export PATH="/Users/pedrojunqueira/.minishift/cache/oc/v3.11.0/darwin:$PATH" Logging in to log in oc login -u <user> -p <password> Deploy an application from git oc new-app https://github.com/sclorg/nodejs-ex -l name=myapp login as sys:admin oc login -u system:admin get users oc get users make an user called administrator a system admin oc adm policy add-cluster-role-to-user cluster-admin administrator
